title: Chapter 4332 - Chapter 4332: 4331 Revenge Turned Into Kindness
body:
Chapter 4332 - Chapter 4332: 4331 Revenge Turned Into Kindness

Chapter 4332: 4331 revenge turned into kindness

Translator: 549690339

The arrival of the strongest expert of the sword sect and the arrival of Song Ta.

Two experts of the Great Dao level rushed over, causing all the surrounding experts and disciples to reveal shocked expressions.

Within a short period of time, four of the most top-notch sect ancestors and Saints had arrived!

These people were the most top-notch existences in the entire Justice Alliance.

Including that mysterious expert, there were already five of them.

However, just as they thought that there would be a world-shaking battle, Song Ta’s words caused all the expert disciples to be stunned.

“What’s going on? The expert beside the sword ancestor actually knows that mysterious expert?”

“One of their own? Looks like they know each other!”

“No way! What’s going on? Which faction is that mysterious expert from? Is He also a top-tier expert of the Justice Alliance?”

All the expert disciples stared at this scene with their mouths Agape as they asked!

The carefree sect ancestor was also slightly stunned when he heard song Ta’s words!

His face was filled with shock!

“Song Ta, you guys know each other?”

The carefree sect ancestor’s expression changed slightly as he asked Song Ta.

They were all top-tier experts within the Justice Alliance.

They naturally knew each other!

Song Ta was a powerful expert from the justice universe.

He was one of the founders of the Justice Alliance.

He wasn’t the strongest within the Justice Alliance, but his status was very high.

Another point was that the justice universe that song Ta was in was the strongest universe in the Justice Alliance.

At the same time, the leader of the Justice Alliance was the strongest in the justice universe.

Similarly, he was also the strongest existence in the Justice Alliance.

However, the leader of the Justice Alliance had not appeared for a long time!

“We know each other, of course we know each other. Not long ago, Old Man Sword and I teamed up with brother Wang Xian to kill that fellow, the spirit kneader. Hehe.”

Song Ta said with a smile on his face!

“HMM?”

His words gave the ancestors of the Xiaoyao sect a slight shock.

“Brother Song Ta, Brother Old Man Jian, I didn’t expect to meet you so soon, and in such a manner.”

Wang Xian looked at them, shook his head slightly and said!

“It’s indeed very fast. The flood has really washed over the Dragon King Temple!”

The serious old man Jian nodded his head and said, “I don’t know what small matter it is that caused brother Wang Xian to make such a big fuss!”

“Old man Jian, are you the sword ancestor of the sword sect? I came across something good while I was wandering around just now.”

Wang Xian smiled and moved his palm. He did not hide anything and took out the embryo directly. “A disciple of your sword sect was possessed by an expert. I happened to sense it, so I took it out.”

“Later on, they said it was their treasure. Hehe, I casually destroyed them!”

“However, I was really lucky this time. There was actually a great dao level powerhouse who was parasitizing your sword sect’s disciples. I think that with this powerhouse’s parasitizing technique, you wouldn’t be able to find out. Therefore, this belongs to me. Hehe!”

“Of course, if this parasitizing technique belonged to your sword sect’s powerhouse, that’s another story!”

As Wang Xian spoke, he smiled faintly.

This expert at the level of the Great Dao was indeed strong in his ability to possess.

If it wasn’t for the fact that Wang Xian could sense the power of chaos in his body, he wouldn’t have been able to notice it!

If he couldn’t notice it, then with old man Jian’s strength, he wouldn’t be able to notice it either!

At that time, a disciple from the sword sect would also be possessed silently.

Of course, Wang Xian wasn’t unreasonable.

If this was a strong practitioner of the sword sect who possessed a disciple of their own sect, Wang Xian would return the embryo to him!

“This is?”

When Wang Xian took out the embryo, the eyes of the patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect froze and a look of shock appeared on his face!

“A strong practitioner of the Great Dao level, possessing a parasite?”

Song ta cried out in surprise and flew directly towards Wang Xian. His gaze was fixed on the embryo!

Old Man Jian also flew over immediately and sized up the embryo carefully!

“D * mn, old man Jian, feel the aura of this embryo. This is the F * cking aura of a devil man. Didn’t we kill this fellow completely?”

All of a sudden, song ta cried out in surprise and shouted at old man Jian!

“It is indeed the aura of a devil man. No, this is a devil man!”

Old Man sword stared at the embryo, his eyes slowly revealing a serious expression.

“More than 10 billion years ago, this guy raised creatures from the universe and was completely destroyed by US and the Deputy Alliance leader. I thought he really was completely killed. I didn’t expect that this guy actually didn’t die!”

“And he actually latched onto old man sword’s disciple. This is obviously revenge!”

Song ta exclaimed, his expression changing slightly!

The Demon was an expert of the sword universe. Speaking of which, he was an existence that was even older and stronger than old man sword.

However, old man sword caught up later, and the sword sect grew stronger. With a leap, he became the strongest force in the sword universe, and Old Man Sword also became the strongest existence.

At that time, there was a conflict with the sect created by the demon.

However, both sides were stable.

But later, the demons were unwilling to live under others, unwilling to let the sword sect grow stronger, so they wanted to quickly increase their own strength.

They raised living beings to slaughter, taking their souls and preparing to refine the demon sword.

In the end, the matter was exposed.

The actions of the demons were completely dehumanizing existences that had no connection with the evil sequence alliance.

Therefore, old man sword reported this matter to the Justice Alliance.

After verification, it was confirmed that they had eliminated them!

However, he didn’t expect that they didn’t die. They were still living in the body of a sword sect disciple!

“The demons cultivate all kinds of evil techniques. There’s a slight possibility that they didn’t die. They are living in the body of a sword sect disciple. They must be seeking revenge!”

“I wonder how long he’s been parasitizing for, but he hasn’t been discovered!”

Old Man Jian said with a grave expression!

This was a major event for the sword sect, an extremely terrifying event.

Old Man Jian had a deep understanding of the terror of the demon!

Back then, in order to exterminate it, four great dao experts and the powers of all the heaven origin creation experts of the sword sect had been mobilized.

They had paid a great price to completely destroy it.

At that time, they thought that they had killed it, but they did not expect that they had let it escape with a chance of survival.

They had actually let it live in a disciple’s body, preparing to possess it.

Most importantly, the devil was right under their noses, and they had not even noticed it.

Just imagining it made him feel a little terrifying!

If he were to recover his strength bit by bit, it would be an unimaginable disaster for the sword sect and the sword universe!

“Old Man Sword, you didn’t notice the crisis under your noses. Now that brother Wang Xian has discovered it, this is a huge good thing for your sword sect. Your Sword sect should thank him properly.”

Song Ta spoke to Old Man Sword!
